attributes.action: Stop animal testing on products such as shampoo conditioner make up
attributes.additional_details: There are so many sweet, innocent animals being  abused for animal testing on products most of these are all left to die once testing is complete they get shampoo conditioner and harmful products forced into their eyes and on their body which is fatal and it has to stop. I'm asking government to ban this and make it clear that anyone who wishes to continue carrying this cruelty out will face  the full force of the law.
attributes.background: We demand parliament to take a close look and subsequently stop animal testing on all products. This is animal cruelty which is killing millions of animals such as dogs across the world and it needs to stop.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

End testing on dogs and other animals for development of products for human use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736578
